actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Agriculture.
Subcommittee on Domestic and Foreign Marketing. Hearings held.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Domestic and Foreign Marketing and Product Promotion

official_title: A bill to amend the Dairy Production Stabilization Act of 1983 to require that members of the National Dairy Promotion and Research Board be elected by milk producers and to prohibit bloc voting by cooperative associations of milk producers in the election of the producers, and for other purposes.
short_title: National Dairy Promotion Reform Act of 1993

summary.text: National Dairy Promotion Reform Act of 1993 - Amends the Dairy Production Stabilization Act of 1983 to require that National Dairy Promotion and Research Board members be elected by a vote of milk producers. Prohibits a certified organization from voting in such elections on behalf of its members (bloc voting).

titles.title: National Dairy Promotion Reform Act of 1993

A bill to amend the Dairy Production Stabilization Act of 1983 to require that members of the National Dairy Promotion and Research Board be elected by milk producers and to prohibit bloc voting by cooperative associations of milk producers in the election of the producers, and for other purposes.
